version.description: This is the version of the api

count.description: If the request returns an array of results, this is the number of results returned in the array

Inputs.description: The parameters that were passed to the API

id.description: A unique identifier for this specific incentive/law/regulation.

state.description: The state in which the incentive/law/regulation was enacted and is active.

title.description: The brief title assigned to the incentive/law/regulation description.

text.description: Description of the incentive/law/regulation, including applicable legislative references, html formated.

enacted_date.description: The date the enacting legislation (if applicable) was signed into law.

amended_date.description: The date the incentive/law/regulation was updated through new legislation or rulemaking.

expired_date.description: The date the incentive/law/regulation is set to end.

archived_date.description: The date that an incentive/law/regulation is no longer relevant to the database. This may include longstanding Executive Orders or laws requiring legislative studies that have been completed.

repealed_date.description: The date legislation is enacted or a rulemaking is finalized to repeal the incentive/law/regulation.

plaintext.description: Description of the incentive/law/regulation, including applicable legislative references, in markdown formatting

is_recent.description: The true or false value used to distinguish between recent federal executive actions (TRUE) and active incentives/laws/regulations (FALSE).

seq_num.description: The numerical value assigned to a description to show the order in which it is displayed online within a jurisdiction (state).

type.description: The category that the incentive/law/regulation falls under, described below: -State Incentives, -Laws and Regulations, -Utility/Private Incentives

agency.description: The agency with primary responsibility for federal incentives/regulations.

significant_update_date.description: When the last significant update to the law was made.

recent_update_or_new.description: An indicator if the last significant update was an update or the laws creation.

contacts.description: The contacts for the given law, returned only if the parameter poc is true

categories.description: The various law categories that apply to this law

types.description: The types that apply to this law

references.description: The URL associated with any bill or legislative reference included in the description.

topics.description: For local incentive/regulation descriptions, the category that the incentive/regulation falls under, described below: Infrastructure Requirements, Vehicle Purchase and Infrastructure Development Incentives, Fuel Use Incentives, Parking Incentives, Technical Assistance, Vehicle Acquisition Requirements, Promotion Initiatives, Idle Reduction Requirements, Renewable Fuels Mandates and Standards

title.description: The job title of the contact

state.description: The state in which the contact is based ('US' for Federal laws and 'DC' for the District of Columbia)

agency.description: The agency that the contact represents

Category.description: A category that the law applies to

code.description: The code used to identify the category

title.description: The full name of the category

category_type.description: The type of category. (E.g. tech, incentive, regulation, user)

LawType.description: The category that the incentive/law/regulation falls under, described below: -State Incentives, -Laws and Regulations, -Utility/Private Incentives

id.description: The id of the law type

title.description: The name of the law type

code.description: The code used to identify the law type

LawReference.description: The URL associated with any bill or legislative reference included in the description.

url.description: The url linking to the reference.

LawTopics.description: For local incentive/regulation descriptions, the category that the incentive/regulation falls under, described below: Infrastructure Requirements, Vehicle Purchase and Infrastructure Development Incentives, Fuel Use Incentives, Parking Incentives, Technical Assistance, Vehicle Acquisition Requirements, Promotion Initiatives, Idle Reduction Requirements, Renewable Fuels Mandates and Standards

id.description: The database id of the law topic

title.description: The name of the law topic

sort_order.description: The sort order of the law topic

metadata.description: The api version number, and the count of laws returned

inputs.description: The parameters that were passed to the api call
The parameters that were passed to the api call

metadata.description: The api version number, and the count of contacts returned

inputs.description: The parameters that were passed to the api call

result.description: The array of Points of Contacts for the state requested

code.description: The code used to identify the category

title.description: The full name of the category

category_type.description: The type of category. (E.g. tech, incentive, regulation, user)

sort_order.description: The sort order for the categories

help_text.description: A short description of what the law category encompasses

metadata.description: The api version number, and the count of categories returned

inputs.description: The parameters that were passed to the api call

result.description: The array of law categories returned

apis.description: Return a full list of laws and incentives that match your query.

operations.summary: Return a full list of laws and incentives that match your query.

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of laws returned

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Return laws for the given Jurisdiction. Jurisdiction must be given as a two character state code (eg, 'CO' for Colorado). A single jurisdiction, or a comma-separate list of multiple jurisdiction, may be given.  Use the code 'US' for federal laws and the code 'DC' for Washington D.C.

parameters.name: technology
parameters.description: Search by the technology type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'BIOD' for Biodiesel, 'ETH' for Ethanol, 'NG' for Natural Gas, 'LPG' for Propane (LPG), 'HY' for Hydrogen Fuel Cells, 'EFFEC' for Fuel Economy / Efficiency, 'IR' for Idle Reduction, 'ELEC' for EVs, 'HEV' for HEVs, 'PHEV' for PHEVs, 'OTHER' for Other, 'AFTMKTCONV' for Aftermarket Conversions, and 'NEVS' for NEVs

parameters.name: incentive_type
parameters.description: Search by the incentive type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'GNT' for Grants, 'TAX' for Tax Incentives, 'LOANS' for Loans and Leases, 'RBATE' for Rebates, 'EXEM' for Exemptions, and 'OTHER' for Other.

parameters.name: regulation_type
parameters.description: Search by the regulation type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'REGIS' for Registration / Licensing, 'STD' for Fuel Production / Quality, 'DREST' for Driving / Idling, 'REQ' for Acquisition / Fuel Use, 'FUEL' for Fuel Taxes, 'RFS' for Renewable Fuel Standard / Mandate, 'OTHER' for Other, 'AIRQEMISSIONS' for Air Quality / Emissions, and 'CCEINIT' for Climate Change / Energy Initiatives

parameters.name: user_type
parameters.description: Search by the user type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'IND' for Vehicle Owner/Driver, 'FLEET' for Fleet Purchaser/Manager, 'STATION' for Fueling / TSE Infrastructure Owner, 'AFP' for Alternative Fuel Producer, 'AFS' for Alternative Fuel Dealer, 'PURCH' for Alternative Fuel Purchaser, 'MAN' for AFV Manufacturer/Retrofitter, and 'OTHER' for Other

parameters.name: poc
parameters.description: Include points of contacts in the return value.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Return only recently added or updated laws and incentives

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: Show only expired, repealed or archived laws and incentives.

parameters.name: law_type
parameters.description: Search by the law type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values are as follows: 'STATEINC' for State Incentives, 'UPINC ' for Utility/Private Incentives, 'LAWREG' for Laws and Regulations, 'INC' for Incentives, 'PROG' for Programs, 'LUP' for Last Updated, 'OVIEW' for Overview, and 'HILITE' for Highlights

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search laws by keyword in title or text.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Show only local examples of laws and incentives.

apis.description: Fetch the details of a specific law given the law's ID.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the law that you are searching

parameters.name: poc
parameters.description: Include points of contacts in the return value.

parameters.description: Return the points of contact for the given Jurisdiction. Jurisdiction must be given as a two character state code (eg, 'CO' for Colorado). A single jurisdiction, or a comma-separate list of multiple jurisdiction, may be given.  Use the code 'US' for federal laws and the code 'DC' for Washington D.C.
